definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Australia/abbr. for 澳大利亞洲|澳大利亚洲[Ao4 da4 li4 ya4 Zhou1]
America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Zhuzhou prefecture level city, on the Xiangjiang river in Hunan

sentences.english: Because of the river's left depositing and right scouring, the Xianfenzhou merged to the left bank becoming frontage.
sentences.chinese: 仙峰洲则因河道左淤右冲而并于左岸成为边滩。

sentences.english: Its headquarters are in Colorado Springs, Colorado.
sentences.chinese: 总部设在美国的科罗多拉洲。

sentences.english: Maybe it’s time to give some of that back to the suffering 50th state.
sentences.chinese: 或许是时候该返回一些给正在遭受50年的夏威夷洲。

sentences.english: He lived in California until he was seventeen.
sentences.chinese: 他在加利福尼亚洲一直住到十七岁。

sentences.english: Today we just arrived in Austin, Texas for SXSWi.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们刚到奥斯汀，得克萨斯洲。

sentences.english: After Sun Yat-sen visited back and Yuet Chau.
sentences.chinese: 孙中山视察过后，回到和悦洲。

sentences.english: It is accessible from Yi Nam Road and Ap Lei Chau Bridge Road to Precious Blood Primary School (South Horizons).
sentences.chinese: 可由怡南道及鸭脷洲桥道前往海怡宝血小学。

sentences.english: The thirty-three year old woman died Monday in Taxes.
sentences.chinese: 这个33岁的妇女星期一死于德克斯洲。

sentences.english: Hurricane Dolly has reached shore near South Padre Island in Texas.
sentences.chinese: 飓风多利已经低到德克萨斯洲的南帕德瑞岛沿岸。

sentences.english: The huge gorilla scared audiences when he climbed the Empire State Building.
sentences.chinese: 观众被一个爬上纽约洲建筑物的大猩猩吓呆了。

sentences.english: The paper discussed flooded days and areas of beach wetlands in Dongting Lake.
sentences.chinese: 研究了洞庭湖洲滩地年淹水天数和面积变化。

sentences.english: King then led a new revolution in Birmingham, Alabama.
sentences.chinese: 然后金在阿拉巴马洲的伯明翰领导了一场新的革命。

sentences.english: The Smiths are moving to Montana for a change of scenery.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯一家为了改变一下环境正把家搬到蒙大拿洲去。

sentences.english: Consequently, Western Australian remained part of the Commonwealth.
sentences.chinese: 因此，西澳大利亚州仍然是澳大利亚联邦的一个洲。

sentences.english: The Story started from Aunt Sam who burned the joss papers(money for the dead)in alane of Tung Pin Chau.
sentences.chinese: 故事由西坪洲冷巷里焚冥纸的三婆启初。

sentences.english: It is the only country which is also a whole continent.
sentences.chinese: 也是这个洲上唯一的国家。

definition: Sing Tao, Hong Kong media group and publisher of Sing Tao Daily 星島日報|星岛日报
abbr. for 梵教[Fan4 jiao4] Brahmanism/abbr. for Sanskrit 梵語|梵语[Fan4 yu3] or 梵文[Fan4 wen2]/abbr. for 梵蒂岡|梵蒂冈[Fan4 di4 gang1], the Vatican
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
Dongzhou district of Fushun city 撫順市|抚顺市, Liaoning
Haiti, the western third of Caribbean island Hispaniola
Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
oath/pledge/union/to ally/league, a subdivision corresponding to prefecture in Inner Mongolia
